text:
@PreetBharara Both.

I’m immunosuppressed. So, the coronavirus can kill me quick. 
If 45 wins, he wants to eliminate coverage for pre-existing conditions so I if I lose my health coverage, it  kills me slow.

There’s a lot of people like me who are in this predicament. Not good on the nerves.
